meanings.sent1: The cliquier always sat with the same group of friends during lunch.
meanings.sent2: She was known as a cliquier because she only socialized with a small circle of people.
meanings.sent3: The cliquier was so loyal to his group that he even wore matching outfits with them.
meanings.sent4: In the school of fish, the cliquier was the one who always swam closely with the others.
meanings.sent5: The cliquier's presence in the team was like a puzzle piece that fit perfectly.

meanings.sent1: Her cliquier behavior made it hard for new students to join the group.
meanings.sent2: The cliquier students always stuck together during group projects.
meanings.sent3: It was amusing to see the cliquier cats forming their own exclusive club in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: The cliquier atmosphere in the office made it challenging for outsiders to integrate.
meanings.sent5: The cliquier nature of the team created a strong bond among its members.
